entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
